div.bibl: Vita Nuova, August, 1928. FOR THE EXPOSITION OF CHICAGO IN 1933.

body.p: Various Italian committees are being formed for the International Exposition which is being held in 1933. Mr. Oscar Durante, director of L'Italia and trustee of the Board of Education, was appointed head of one committee. Head of the Exposition is Rufus Dawes, brother of Vice President Chas. Dawes. Among the presidents of the various ladies' groups is Miss Bartolomey a very cultured lady who for many years has been active in our community.
